articles.title: How India Can Still Miss Out On Champions Trophy 2025 Semifinals Despite Big Win Against Pakistan - .. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India took a giant step towards securing qualification to the Champions Trophy 2025 semifinals with a comprehensive six-wicket victory over Pakistan in Dubai.
articles.content: India took a giant step towards securing qualification to the Champions Trophy 2025 semifinals with a comprehensive six-wicket victory over Pakistan in Dubai on Sunday. Virat Kohli produced a stunnin… [+1580 chars]
